titleStmt.title: Panoplia, or, The whole armour of God explained and applyed for the conduct and comfort of a Christian in all his tryals and tentations : as also the dying preachers legacy in several sermons, being the last labours of the reverend author in the course of his ministry : together with certain seasonable considerations proving the lawfulness and expediency of a set form of lyturgy in the church / by Richard Venner.
titleStmt.author: Venner, Richard, b. 1598?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Ratcliffe for John Durham,

notesStmt.note: "All prepared for the press by the reverend author before his decease and now made publick for the common good."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
